name: How to Play Poker and Win
name_original: How to Play Poker and Win
description:
How To Play Poker and Win is an app that includes some very helpful information on how to play Poker right, and even advanced techniques for winning.

Here's some of what has been included:

Getting Started
Quick Rules
Glossary
History of Poker
The Basics
Tournaments
First Time Nerves
Mistakes to Avoid
Professional Skills
Texas Hold'em Pro
Intellectual Component
Online Poker Tips
Bluffing
Tells

And More.......

So What Are you Waiting For!

Download the "How To Play Poker" App Now!

And learn Poker Strategies Today !!
